name: GremlinOS
description:
The flash games have fought back and filled your computer with gremlins..... Fight back and take back your hard drive

WASD - move
Left Mouse - attack
Space - jump/double jump
S (while in mid air) - air smash attack
P - toggle god mode

Built for the 2017 REV Game Jam for Vinesauce: RevScarecrow

Art - shugarshock
Music/Sounds - Dawngle
Programming - Calico
Programming - PancakeMisery
